author: By Ashley Collman For Dailymail.com
description: Elizabeth Ailes released a statement to Matt Drudge Thursday morning, saying that her husband Roger, age 77, had died.
title: Roger Ailes dead aged 77

author: Ahiza Garcia
description: Here's a look at the way that Fox News covered the news of Roger Ailes' death.
title: How Fox News covered Roger Ailes' death on air

author: Zach Schonfeld
description: Roger Ailes had "flaws," "sins," "misdeeds," and "imperfections," according to the Right.
title: How conservatives are tiptoeing around the Roger Ailes harassment scandal

author: Ezra Dulis
description: Matt Drudge of the Drudge Report has announced that Roger Ailes, former CEO of Fox News, has died at 77 years old.
title: Roger Ailes Has Died - Breitbart

author: Adam Shaw
description: Liberal journalists reacted with nastiness and glee Thursday to news of the death of former Fox News Chairman and CEO Roger Ailes
title: Liberal journalists get nasty, make jokes after Roger Ailesâ€™ death

author: Lisa Bloom
description: Men like Roger Ailes don't just sexually harass women, they destroy them.
title: Roger Ailes Is Dead. Now, His Victims' Stories Must Live.

description: Roger Ailes, founder and former chief executive of Fox News, dies aged 77, Fox News says.
title: Murdoch 'shocked and grieved' by death of Fox News founder Roger Ailes

author: Bill O'Reilly
description: Fox News crowned Roger Ailes' career. In 1996, the cable news startup was mocked by CNN's Ted Turner. Few thought it would happen, but Ailes and his inexperienced crew dethroned Turner quickly.
title: Bill O'Reilly: Roger Ailes endured hatred 'and it killed him. That is the truth.'

author: Reuters
description: The death of Fox News founder Roger Ailes could pose a hurdle to a series of lawsuits that claimed he sexually harassed female anchors.
title: Fate of Roger Ailes Sexual Harassment Lawsuits Unclear After His Death

author: Rebecca Harrington
description: Roger Ailes, the former CEO and chairman of Fox News, died at age 77 on Thursday.
title: Megyn Kelly said an 'underground army of women' at Fox News helped oust Roger Ailes for sexual harassment
